original_title: SLT-MOBITEL partners with Prime Group ‘The Grand’
original_body_lines: SLT Chief Regional Business Officer Imantha Wijekoon and Prime Lands Residencies PLC Managing Director Manjula Weerakkody exchanging signed agreement

SLT-MOBITEL, has signed an agreement recently with Prime Lands Residencies PLC to provide comprehensive ICT solutions with SLT-MOBITEL Fibre connectivity for its prestigious and ultra-luxury masterpiece Residences, ‘The Grand’, located at Ward Place, Colombo 7.

Brilliantly designed ‘The Grand’s’ elegant apartments offer true comfort and privacy, bringing a sense of flair and discernment, creating the ultimate standard in luxury for every aspect of the living experience. Comprising 37 floors and 160 meters in height, The Grand also offers over 50,000 sq. ft areas for leisure and recreation featuring several levels of curated indoor and outdoor amenities.

Sharing his thoughts on the partnership Manjula Weerakkody stated: “The Grand has been celebrated as providing residents an extraordinary lifestyle experience. Partnering SLT-MOBITEL we have full confidence in receiving superior fibre their capabilities, smart home and ICT solutions to meet the high standard of expectations synonymous with upper echelon lifestyles.”

SLT-MOBITEL will power The Grand’s entire suite of apartments with fibre solutions infrastructure enabling ultra-fast internet connectivity, crystal clear voice communication as well world-class entertainment with access to high definition (HD) TV content via PEO TV.

SLT Chief Regional Business Officer Imantha Wijekoon commented: “We are proud to partner with Prime Group’s flagship apartment complex, ‘The Grand’ Ward Place. Smart apartments represent a fundamental shift in changing consumer lifestyles. Through its state-of-the-art ICT and Fibre solutions, SLT-MOBITEL can provide world-class ICT services that meet international standards.

“In keeping with The Grand’s ethos of creating the ultimate standard of luxury living, residents will experience futuristic living spaces through SLT-MOBITEL’s robust and reliable ICT services and smart home automation solutions. SLT-MOBITEL’s smart living solutions will tap into high-tech functionality, making life easier and more enjoyable offering flexibility for new devices and applications, enhancing security and facilitating an ultimate privileged lifestyle.”
